data.actual_result: Embed is created with text, escaping the mardown (raw text)
data.expected_result: Discord creates and embed with text preview, where text is formatted according to the markdown presented.
data.short_description: When posting reddit link to a text post with mardown in it, the raw text is displayed in the embed preview, instead of formatted version
data.steps_to_repro: - Find reddit text post with mardown formatting in the beginning - Post the link of that post in Discord
